messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/26/2003 10:37:33 PM Eastern Standard Time,
regstehe@... writes:


>
> That's how they pronounce Nevada St. in East Toledo. Maybe the kid is just
> a
> product of the area.
> Regina
>

LOL, that could be it, Regina! Maybe he heard the street name mentioned
somewhere. I just recently learned that it was pronounced that way.
Amy Kagey

messages.subject: Nevada
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/25/03 11:47:46 AM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/25/03 11:47:46 AM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
writes:

<< LOL I have a kid who insists that Nevada should be pronounced "Nev-A-da"
with
the long A sound in the middle of the word.
Amy Kagey >>

That's how they pronounce Nevada St. in East Toledo. Maybe the kid is just a
product of the area.
Regina
